body: Czech Position reports that "uncertainty prevailed among [Czech] lawyers on whether [former Ukrainian Economy Minister] Bohdan Danylyshyn merits asylum in the Czech Republic."

title: Czrch Republic: Lawyers Uncertain About Ukrainian Politician's Right to Asylum
